entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 70
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 60S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST 15 TO 20 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70
